channel.title: CVE Feed for Openshift Enterprise -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Openshift Enterprise -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-19348|2024-08-05T02:16:46.972Z -- openshift%20enterprise -- openshift%2Fapb-base
item.description: An insecure modification vulnerability in the /etc/passwd file was found in the container openshift/apb-base, affecting versions before the following 4.3.5, 4.2.21, 4.1.37, and 3.11.188-4. An attacker with access to the container could use this flaw to modify /etc/passwd and escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-1103|2024-08-05T03:51:48.543Z -- openshift%20enterprise -- unsanitized%20paths%20in%20tar.go
item.description: Openshift Enterprise source-to-image before version 1.1.10 is vulnerable to an improper validation of user input. An attacker who could trick a user into using the command to copy files locally, from a pod, could override files outside of the target directory of the command.

item.title: CVE-2019-19346|2024-08-05T02:16:47.011Z -- openshift%20enterprise -- openshift%2Fmariadb-apb
item.description: An insecure modification vulnerability in the /etc/passwd file was found in the container openshift/mariadb-apb, affecting versions before the following 4.3.5, 4.2.21, 4.1.37, and 3.11.188-4 . An attacker with access to the container could use this flaw to modify /etc/passwd and escalate their privileges.
